TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi VirtualizingStackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class VirtualizingStackPanel Inherits VirtualizingPanel Implements IScrollInfo
type VirtualizingStackPanel = class inherit VirtualizingPanel interface IScrollInfo

summary.span: 在水平或垂直的一行中排列并显示内容。

span.span: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于屏幕上所显示的项的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在屏幕上可能只有少量元素，元素可以对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 来创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. 中的虚拟化面板中包含的项控件创建其自己的项容器时才出现。Virtualization in a only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers. 您可以确保通过使用数据绑定将发生这种情况。You can ensure this happens by using data binding. 在其中创建和添加到项目控件中，项容器的情况下相比，提供没有性能优势。In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a offers no performance advantage over a . 默认项宿主元素。 is the default items host for the element. 默认情况下`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`true`。By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`. 当`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`false`即的行为与普通相同。When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a behaves the same as an ordinary . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源和虚拟化中显示的项元素使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请注意，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性显式设置为`true`。Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xaml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)] 下面的示例创建，并设置`VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode`附加属性设置为。The following example creates a and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下面的示例演示使用上一示例中的数据。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于屏幕上所显示的项的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在屏幕上可能只有少量元素，元素可以对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 来创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术，它可以从更多的基于屏幕上所显示的项的数据项中生成的 UI 元素子集。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 只有少量元素可能在屏幕上时生成许多 UI 元素可以会在应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 若要创建仅为可见项的 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information |标识符字段 |IsVirtualizingProperty | |元数据属性设置为`true`|无 ||Identifier field|IsVirtualizingProperty| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源和虚拟化中显示的项元素中的使用 XAML。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element by using XAML. 请注意 IsVirtualizing 附加属性显式设置为`true`。Notice that the IsVirtualizing attached property is explicitly set to `true`. ```xaml ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LineDown() cil managed
abstract member LineDown : unit -> unit override this.LineDown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将内容向下滚动一个逻辑单位。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写此方法在派生类中，若要更改堆叠面板将内容向的滚动。You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward. 例如，您可以内容向下滚动而不是一个两个单位。For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动功能，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当滚动时，不会增加布局大小，但有效地将其子代添加在 z 平面，这通常剪裁的父元素 (通常) 到堆栈的大小。When scrolling, does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a ) to the size of the stack.

summary.span: 向下逻辑滚动内容以响应鼠标滚轮按钮的向下单击操作。

span.span: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a downward click of the mouse wheel button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写派生的类，以更改堆叠面板如何响应鼠标滚轮操作列表中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动功能，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

span.span: Scrolls content logically upward in response to an upward click of the mouse wheel button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写派生的类，以更改堆叠面板如何响应鼠标滚轮操作中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel up action. 如果你需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性设置为`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动功能，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

Protected Overridable Sub OnCleanUpVirtualizedItem (e As CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs)

span.span: Data about the event.

summary.span: 当重新虚拟化由 承载的项时调用。

span.span: Called when an item that is hosted by the is re-virtualized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于屏幕上所显示的项的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在屏幕上可能只有少量元素，元素可以对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 来创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于屏幕上所显示的项的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在屏幕上可能只有少量元素，元素可以对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 来创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术，它可以从更多的基于屏幕上所显示的项的数据项中生成的 UI 元素子集。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of UI elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 只有少量元素可能在屏幕上时生成许多 UI 元素可以会在应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many UI elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数量，并处理从 ItemsControl (如或) 若要创建仅为可见项的 UI 元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an ItemsControl (such as or ) to create UI elements only for visible items.
